DEEP STATE.Definition: people within government or the military who are believed to control and manipulate government policy

NICHE.Definition: only appealing to a small amount of people

MAINSTREAM.Definition: considered normal, or believed and used by many

ELITE.Definition: the richest and most powerful people in society

ENABLED.Definition: provided with the opportunity or tools to do something

PROPHECY.Definition: a statement that something will happen

SECURITY CLEARANCE.Definition: an official permission to see security or state secrets

RIDDLES.Definition: a question or clue that is deliberately confusing

TIRELESSLY.Definition: in a very hard or determined way

THE ESTABLISHMENT.Definition: the group of people in a society that have all of the power and influence

FACTION.Definition: a group within a larger group

ENCRYPTED.Definition: put into a special code so that it is hard to understand

ALGORITHMS.Definition: the code in a computer programme

HOOKED IN.Definition: introduce someone to something so that they become dependent on it

GOINGS ON.Definition: events or activities, often strange or unusual ones

EMPOWER.Definition: to give someone power (to do something)

SCAVENGER HUNT.Definition: a game in which you collect different items

GESTICULATING.Definition: moving hands or arms, usually to express meaning

AWAKENING.Definition: when you suddenly realise the truth

CATCHPHRASES.Definition: phrases that are often used by someone or something
